title: Vanuatu Beachfront Villa Escape with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Set your watch to island time at this Caribbean-inspired resort on the idyllic Coral Sea in Efate, Vanuatu. This boutique beachfront retreat, featuring just 15 traditionally crafted villas, offers unparalleled seclusion and tranquillity.

Enjoy panoramic ocean views and delectable dishes made from fresh, locally sourced organic produce at Tamanu on the Beach Restaurant. For ultimate relaxation, indulge in a treatment at Tamanu Day Spa. For the adventurous, the island’s underwater caverns, coral reefs and WWII shipwrecks offer exciting exploration opportunities.

Whether you're a family or a couple, you'll find everything you need for a perfect beachfront getaway, from excellent dining options to vibrant local markets. After a day of adventure, return to your private beach villa to watch the sunset, listen to the soothing rustle of palm trees and enjoy the serene, empty beach.
location_description: Tamanu on the Beach Resort and Spa
offer_address: White Sands Road, Port Vila, Efate, Vanuatu

title: Oceanfront Villa Escape with All-Inclusive Meals for Eight Adults and Three Children
description: Set on six acres of lush tropical gardens right on the edge of the Tuk Tuk Marine Sanctuary, your barefoot island oasis awaits at the Nakatumble Luxury Eco Resort. Nestled between the rainforest and the reef, this Vanuatu eco-haven invites you to discover true serenity with all-inclusive meals, a half-day of massages and cocktails, plus return airport transfers for up to eight adults and three children.

title: Vanuatu Beachfront Villa Luxury with Decadent Dining, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Set your watch to island time at Vanuatu's peaceful and private Tamanu on the Beach, a Caribbean-inspired resort located right on the postcard-perfect Coral Sea. Currently one of the top five hotels in Port Vila on Tripadvisor, this boutique beachfront oasis - home to just 15 traditionally crafted bungalows - promises complete seclusion and serenity with a private white-sand beach, superb beachfront dining and an in-house spa.

Just a few short strides from the beachfront's shallow, emerald waters, sits Tamanu Restaurant. Here you can drink in panoramic ocean views and savour mouthwatering dishes crafted using fresh, locally grown organic produce and choose from an extensive wine list. Return to the comforts of your private beach bungalow where you can watch the sunset, listen to the tranquil swaying of lofty palms and admire the deserted sandy beach.
location_description: Tamanu on the Beach Resort and Spa
offer_address: White Sands Road, Port Vila, Efate, Vanuatu

title: Vanuatu Beachfront Villa Luxury with Decadent Dining, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Set your watch to island time at Vanuatu's peaceful and private Tamanu on the Beach, a Caribbean-inspired resort located right on the postcard-perfect Coral Sea, on the main island of Efate. This stunning beachfront oasis is home to just 15 traditionally crafted villas and promises complete seclusion and serenity with a private white-sand beach, superb beachfront dining and an in-house spa.

Just a few short strides from the beachfront's shallow, emerald waters, sits Tamanu Restaurant. Here you can drink in panoramic ocean views and savour mouthwatering dishes crafted using fresh, locally grown organic produce and choose from an extensive wine list. Return to the comforts of your private beach villas where you can watch the sunset, listen to the tranquil swaying of lofty palms and admire the deserted sandy beach.
location_description: Tamanu on the Beach Resort and Spa
offer_address: White Sands Road, Port Vila, Efate, Vanuatu

title: Grand Reopening: Vanuatu Beachfront Escape with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drink & A$300 Dining Credit
description:
Escape to island bliss with a stay at this sun-drenched resort, perfectly positioned on the tranquil shores of Erakor Lagoon. Surrounded by swaying palms and turquoise waters, this tropical haven offers direct access to soft white sands and an array of water activities. Start your day with a swim, try paddleboarding or explore the marine life with a snorkelling or diving adventure.

Immerse yourself in Vanuatu’s vibrant atmosphere with a trip to the spectacular Mele Cascades Waterfalls, visit the world’s only underwater post office or wander through Port Vila’s markets for handcrafted souvenirs, tropical produce and local island flavours. For a deeper cultural connection, experience traditional island life at Ekasup Village.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Vanuatu, an IHG Hotel

title: Vanuatu Beachfront Villa Escape with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Set your watch to island time at Vanuatu's peaceful and private Tamanu on the Beach Resort and Spa, a Caribbean-inspired resort located right on the postcard-perfect Coral Sea. This boutique beachfront oasis - home to just 15 traditionally crafted bungalows - promises complete seclusion and serenity. Drink in panoramic ocean views and savour mouthwatering dishes crafted using fresh, locally grown, organic produce at the beachfront Tamanu Restaurant, or sink further into relaxation with a treatment at Tamanu Day Spa. 

Adventurers and explorers can snorkel in the island's underwater caverns, coral reefs and WWII shipwrecks, while families and couples will find everything they desire for a relaxing beachfront retreat at great restaurants and colourful local markets. Return to the comforts of your private beach bungalow, where you can watch the sunset, listen to the tranquil swaying of lofty palms and admire the deserted sandy beach.
location_description: Tamanu on the Beach Resort and Spa
offer_address: White Sands Road, Port Vila, Efate, Vanuatu

title: Vanuatu Oceanfront Eco Elegance with Daily All-Day Breakfast & Return Airport Transfers
description:
Discover a serene six-acre waterfront haven nestled within lush tropical gardens at this boutique retreat. Whether you choose to unwind poolside or savour a sunset dinner by the ocean, every moment at Nakatumble is designed for relaxation and connection. Enjoy immersive farm-to-table dining curated by a dedicated chef, using the finest local ingredients. From freshly caught tuna and mahi mahi to homegrown salads and traditional delicacies like tuluk, each meal offers a personalised culinary journey.

Beyond the resort, adventure awaits with vibrant local markets, crystal-clear snorkelling spots and trips to natural wonders like the Blue Lagoon. Indulge in rejuvenating massages in the comfort of your accommodation or take a refreshing dip in the natural rock pools - all within this sustainable sanctuary.

title: Vanuatu Island Haven with Daily Breakfast, A$300 Dining Credit & Nightly Cocktails
description:
A dreamy island retreat awaits at Iririki Island Resort & Spa, set amid tropical terrains and enveloped by exquisite shores and snorkelling spots. This breezy resort offers access to the bustling markets of Port Vila, accessed by a complimentary, five-minute ferry, departing multiple times throughout the day. Take the time to savour exquisite local cuisine at the resort's four dining venues, including Azure Restaurant, which offers guests sweeping views over the harbour, and unwind at the indulgent day spa.

Adventure across the calm harbour to the vibrant centre of Port Vila and spend days exploring the hubbub of crafty cafes, buzzing restaurants and bars, boutique stores and cultural sites. Hop between sparkling lagoons and flowing waterfalls or zipline through the local jungle. Retreat to your island haven for poolside treats at Sunset Pool, Bar & Grill, or settle in for an afternoon of family fun at the tennis court or games room before retreating to your bungalow or deluxe room.

title: Vanuatu's Newest Beachfront Resort
description: Immerse yourself in the tropical island splendour of the dreamy South Pacific at the Ramada Resort Port Vila in Vanuatu. Situated on a white-sand beach overlooking a turquoise coral-filled lagoon, you can do as much or as little as you want. Stay five nights and enjoy daily breakfast, a buffet dinner, two-for-one lunch discount, daily cocktail, return airport transfers, complimentary snorkelling, kayaking and stand-up paddle boarding, and more for two.

title: Secluded Villa Luxury with Decadent Dining Inclusions, Return Airport Transfers and More
description: Indulge in the ultimate island escape to Vanuatu's exclusive Tamanu on the Beach Resort & Spa, a Caribbean inspired resort located right on the postcard perfect Tamanu Beach. Holiday like a celebrity with daily breakfast, a VIP breakfast with French sparkling wine, a daily cocktail each, two signature lunches with a glass of house wine or beer, a lavish two-course dinner, return airport transfers, a romantic turn down service on your first night with the finest chocolate in Vanuatu, a welcome fruit platter with a bottle of wine on arrival, two 60-minute couple's massages and a AUD$100 Spa credit at Tamanu Spa.
location_description: Tamanu on the Beach Resort and Spa
offer_address: White Sands Road, Port Vila, Efate, Vanuatu

title: Secluded Villa Luxury with Gourmet Dining Inclusions and Daily Cocktails
description: Award-winning Vanuatu indulgence is at your fingertips at the exclusive Tamanu on the Beach, a Caribbean-inspired resort located right on postcard-perfect Tamanu Beach. Voted one of TripAdvisor’s top five hotels in Port Vila, this boutique beachfront oasis promises to treat you like a celebrity with daily à la carte breakfast, two seasonal à la carte lunches with a glass of house wine or beer, one à la carte two-course set-menu dinner, a daily beachfront cocktail each, a welcome bottle of wine, a fruit cocktail or chilled coconut and tropical fruit platter on arrival, two 60-minute full-body couples’ massages at Tamanu Spa, A$100 spa credit to use towards any treatment, return airport transfers and so much more.
location_description: Tamanu on the Beach Resort and Spa
offer_address: White Sands Road, Port Vila, Efate, Vanuatu

title: Vanuatu Beachfront Villa Escape for Four with Massages & Champagne
description:
Indulge in the ultimate tropical escape amid the dreamy landscape of Vanuatu with a luxury beachfront stay at Villa 25 in Port Vila. This exclusive property - currently ranked #1 in Port Vila on TripAdvisor for speciality lodging - offers a collection of just three, spacious and beautifully appointed two-bedroom villas surrounded by swaying palm trees and located steps from a pristine private beach.

Bring friends and family along and unwind in your private villa while enjoying a one-time breakfast hamper delivered to your villa, a welcome hamper with fresh fruit and local delicacies, a bottle of Champagne to celebrate your escape, a 60-minute massage per adult and return transfers from Port Vila airport.
offer_address: 25 Dream Cove Wharf Road, Port Vila, Vanuatu

title: Tropical Hideaway with Indulgent Dining Inclusions and Daily Drinks
description: Immerse yourself in tropical Vanuatu at Ramada Resort Port Vila, located on a white-sand beach overlooking a pristine lagoon. Indulge in the ultimate island escape and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, three one-course dinners during your stay, a free entrée with any meal purchased at the resort’s restaurant, a daily cocktail per person, a discount booklet for local experiences and activities, return airport transfers, complimentary snorkelling, kayaking, stand-up paddle boarding and more. PLUS one infant and one child aged 11 years and under stay, play and eat for free from a kids’ menu, sharing existing bedding.
location_description: Ramada Resort by Wyndham Port Vila

title: Vanuatu Beachfront Villa Luxury with Decadent Daily Dining, Nightly Cocktails & 60-Minute Massages
description:
Set your watch to island time at Vanuatu's peaceful and private Tamanu on the Beach, a Caribbean-inspired resort located right on the postcard-perfect Coral Sea. Voted one of Tripadvisor’s top five hotels in Port Vila, this boutique beachfront oasis - home to just 15 traditionally crafted bungalows - promises complete seclusion and serenity with a private white-sand beach, superb beachfront dining and an in-house spa.

Just a few short strides from the beachfront's shallow, emerald waters, sits Tamanu Restaurant. Here you can drink in panoramic ocean views and savour mouthwatering dishes crafted using fresh, locally grown organic produce and choose from an extensive wine list. Return to the comforts of your private beach bungalow where you can watch the sunset, listen to the tranquil swaying of lofty palms and admire the deserted sandy beach.
location_description: Tamanu on the Beach Resort and Spa
offer_address: White Sands Road, Port Vila, Efate, Vanuatu

title: Secluded Vanuatu Beachfront Villa Haven Overlooking the Coral Sea
description: Feel endless bliss when you stay at Tamanu on the Beach, a Caribbean-inspired resort overlooking the postcard-perfect Coral Sea. This beachfront oasis is home to just 15 traditionally crafted bungalows and promises total serenity with a private white-sand beach, superb beachfront dining at Tamanu Restaurant and an in-house spa. Hop between the surrounding islands to discover hidden swimming holes, incredible waterfalls, ancient volcanoes and beautiful reefs.
location_description: Tamanu on the Beach Resort and Spa
offer_address: White Sands Road, Port Vila, Efate, Vanuatu

title: Vanuatu Beachfront Hideaway with Swim-Up Pool Bar
description: Nestled on golden shores, the Ramada Resort by Wyndham Port Vila offers azure views of the glistening Erakor Lagoon from each of its self-contained apartments. Appealing to both couples looking for a romantic getaway, and families searching for a sun-kissed holiday, resort activities include kayaking, stand-up paddle boarding, snorkelling, beach volley and more. After days of fun in the sun, enjoy a refreshing cocktail at the pool swim-up bar or grab a bite to eat at Akiriki Restaurant.
location_description: Ramada Resort by Wyndham Port Vila

title: Vanuatu Haven with Snorkelling Cove, Day Spa & Resort Pools
description:
A dreamy island retreat awaits at luxurious Iririki Island Resort & Spa, a tropical oasis in the heart of Vanuatu's Port Vila Harbour. This breezy retreat offers access to pristine beaches, vibrant coral reefs and the bustling markets of Port Vila, just a few minutes away by ferry.

Savour exquisite local cuisine at the resort's Azure Restaurant, which provides sweeping views of the harbour. Then unwind at the indulgent spa, or snorkel the day away in the picturesque coves before returning to shore and reclining on the white sands or shady pool decks.

title: Vanuatu Lagoon Luxury with Pool Bar & Kids Club
description: Wistful dreams of turquoise lagoons and iced-white beaches come true at Holiday Inn Resort Vanuatu, a tropical island paradise. Ideal as a family destination or romantic escape, discover gems such as a kids' club, overwater villas, two swimming pools and a tranquil day spa. When it comes to dining, be wowed by lagoon panoramas and a mouthwatering menu (try the Vanuatu rock lobster) at Verandah, or simply savour a cocktail at the Pool Bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Vanuatu, an IHG Hotel
